Title: SNS Police
Description: ['The story centers around the titular ', SNS Police, ' (Social Network Service Police), who protect the peace in social media sites like Twitter and Facebook and deal harsh justice to those who violate it. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
